title: Tesla 's net loss attributable to common stockholders 2013 to 2019
summary: In general Loss in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Loss in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The line rapidly increased by 202.38% from Year 2014 to 2015, and lastly, increased by 190.67% from Year 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Loss in million U.S. dollars, about 1962.0 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest Loss in million U.S. dollars, of value 294.0 was reported at Year 2014
